Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IId bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacteria:Enterococcus faecalis RJ-11, Enterococcus sp. strain RB-3, Enterococcus sp. strain RJ-10, Enterococcus sp. strain SJ-16, Enterococcus sp. strain YJ-35, Enterococcus durans KB-60, Lactococcus lactis IFO12007, Leuconostoc mesenteroides IFO3426, Bacillus subtilis JCM1465, Bacillus amyloliquefaciens B1, Bacillus cereus B3, Listeria monocytogenes SUB635, Staphylococcus aureus SUB511.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: No comments found on DRAMP database

Literature.Title: Purification and characterization of a novel bacteriocin produced by Enterococcus faecalis strain RJ-11.
Literature.Author: Yamamoto Y, Togawa Y, Shimosaka M, Okazaki M.
